article_title: Voluntary benefits players enter PPACA World car wash
article_text:
Carriers reported seeing intense competition for business. (AP photo/Matthias Rietschel)

Most of the major Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) product design and underwriting rules are really here now, especially for the larger employers that already have to think about the PPACA employee counting rules.

For worksite and voluntary benefits sellers, for now, at least, the effects of PPACA on their market seem to be small, hazy or positive.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: For sellers of supplemental products, the water may be fine.

For worksite and voluntary benefits sellers, for now, at least, the effects of PPACA on their market seem to be small, hazy or positive.
(AP photo/Matthias Rietschel)Most of the major Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) product design and underwriting rules are really here now, especially for the larger employers that already have to think about the PPACA employee counting rules.
Carriers reported seeing intense competition for business.
